data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mclay, Colin (2007): New crabs from hydrothermal vents of the Kermadec Ridge submarine volcanoes, New Zealand: Gandalfus gen. nov. (Bythograeidae) and Xenograpsus (Varunidae) (Decapoda: Brachyura). Zootaxa 1524: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177502
